channel.title: Pixadex

item.description:
New Features

  • Adds an “Express” update delivery channel for pre-release updates. Switch delivery channels in Pixadex → Settings… → Updates

Fixes and Improvements

  • Improves performance and interface responsiveness while scrolling and changing the icon preview size
  • Fixes an issue where the window would resize when changing the view mode
  • Improves the window resizing behavior
  • The icon names are no longer displayed when the icon preview size is below 64 pixels
  • Improves the status bar layout
  • Reverts the app icon to the original for all macOS versions (see Known Issues)
  • Includes minor improvements behind the scenes

Known Issues

  • Due to changing behaviors in the beta release cycle of Xcode 26, we are currently unable to provide app icons tailored to each version of macOS. For now, Pixadex uses the original icon intended for macOS 15 Sequoia.

channel.description:
New Features

  • Adds a new app icon for macOS 26 Tahoe

Fixes and Improvements

  • Adds links to the Help menu
  • Improves low-resolution emulation which is now only available on supported displays with high pixel density and a peak brightness of at least 1,500 cd/m2 (nits)
  • Fixes an issue with over-the-air updates
  • Includes updates behind the scenes
